comment:
* Delegate used by the WebView provider implementation to access
 * the required framework functionality needed to implement a {@link WebView}.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public void setOnTraceEnabledChangeListener(final OnTraceEnabledChangeListener listener)
methods.comment:
* Register a callback to be invoked when tracing for the WebView component has been
     * enabled/disabled.

methods.name: public boolean isTraceTagEnabled()
methods.comment: * Returns {@code true} if the WebView trace tag is enabled and {@code false} otherwise.

methods.name: public boolean canInvokeDrawGlFunctor(View containerView)
methods.comment:
* Returns {@code true} if the draw GL functor can be invoked (see {@link #invokeDrawGlFunctor})
     * and {@code false} otherwise.
     *
     * @deprecated Use {@link #drawWebViewFunctor(Canvas, int)}

methods.name: public void invokeDrawGlFunctor(View containerView, long nativeDrawGLFunctor, boolean waitForCompletion)
methods.comment:
* Invokes the draw GL functor. If waitForCompletion is {@code false} the functor
     * may be invoked asynchronously.
     *
     * @param nativeDrawGLFunctor the pointer to the native functor that implements
     *        system/core/include/utils/Functor.h
     * @deprecated Use {@link #drawWebViewFunctor(Canvas, int)}

methods.name: public void callDrawGlFunction(Canvas canvas, long nativeDrawGLFunctor)
methods.comment:
* Calls the function specified with the nativeDrawGLFunctor functor pointer. This
     * functionality is used by the WebView for calling into their renderer from the
     * framework display lists.
     *
     * @param canvas a hardware accelerated canvas (see {@link Canvas#isHardwareAccelerated()})
     * @param nativeDrawGLFunctor the pointer to the native functor that implements
     *        system/core/include/utils/Functor.h
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the canvas is not hardware accelerated
     * @deprecated Use {@link #drawWebViewFunctor(Canvas, int)}

methods.name: public void callDrawGlFunction(@NonNull Canvas canvas, long nativeDrawGLFunctor, @Nullable Runnable releasedRunnable)
methods.comment:
* Calls the function specified with the nativeDrawGLFunctor functor pointer. This
     * functionality is used by the WebView for calling into their renderer from the
     * framework display lists.
     *
     * @param canvas a hardware accelerated canvas (see {@link Canvas#isHardwareAccelerated()})
     * @param nativeDrawGLFunctor the pointer to the native functor that implements
     *        system/core/include/utils/Functor.h
     * @param releasedRunnable Called when this nativeDrawGLFunctor is no longer referenced by this
     *        canvas, so is safe to be destroyed.
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the canvas is not hardware accelerated
     * @deprecated Use {@link #drawWebViewFunctor(Canvas, int)}

methods.name: public void drawWebViewFunctor(@NonNull Canvas canvas, int functor)
methods.comment:
* Call webview draw functor. See API in draw_fn.h.
     * @param canvas a {@link RecordingCanvas}.
     * @param functor created by AwDrawFn_CreateFunctor in draw_fn.h.

methods.name: public void detachDrawGlFunctor(View containerView, long nativeDrawGLFunctor)
methods.comment:
* Detaches the draw GL functor.
     *
     * @param nativeDrawGLFunctor the pointer to the native functor that implements
     *        system/core/include/utils/Functor.h
     * @deprecated Use {@link #drawWebViewFunctor(Canvas, int)}

methods.name: public int getPackageId(Resources resources, String packageName)
methods.comment: * Returns the package id of the given {@code packageName}.

methods.name: public Application getApplication()
methods.comment: * Returns the application which is embedding the WebView.

methods.name: public String getErrorString(Context context, int errorCode)
methods.comment: * Returns the error string for the given {@code errorCode}.

methods.name: public void addWebViewAssetPath(Context context)
methods.comment: * Adds the WebView asset path to {@link android.content.res.AssetManager}.

methods.name: public boolean isMultiProcessEnabled()
methods.comment: * Returns whether WebView should run in multiprocess mode.

methods.name: public String getDataDirectorySuffix()
methods.comment: * Returns the data directory suffix to use, or null for none.

methodNames: public void invokeDrawGlFunctor(View containerView, long nativeDrawGLFunctor, boolean waitForCompletion)
public void callDrawGlFunction(Canvas canvas, long nativeDrawGLFunctor)
public void callDrawGlFunction(@NonNull Canvas canvas, long nativeDrawGLFunctor, @Nullable Runnable releasedRunnable)
public void drawWebViewFunctor(@NonNull Canvas canvas, int functor)
public void detachDrawGlFunctor(View containerView, long nativeDrawGLFunctor)
public int getPackageId(Resources resources, String packageName)
public String getErrorString(Context context, int errorCode)
